parameters.name: resultType
parameters.doc:
The class that the result is expected to have. It is ensured, that the result is of this class. If the codec produces data
of another class, an exception will be thrown.

doc.summary: Provides some utility methods to encode and decode thing using a codec for a  specific <ref cls="com/mojang/serialization/DynamicOps">DynamicOps</ref>.
doc.text:
Provides some utility methods to encode and decode thing using a codec for a specific DynamicOps.
CodecOps for json and nbt can be found in CodecHelper.
